document.full_text: canada edged past arch rivals united states 4-3 in a shootout at the world ice hockey championship on friday and finland also needed overtime to down germany 5-4.
document.title: canada sinks u.s. while czechs beat slovaks
lines_and_colors: canada edged past arch rivals united states 4-3 in a shootout at the world ice hockey championship on friday and finland also needed overtime to down germany 5-4.
